information.name: kmz-map
information.description: A UISP CRM plugin that provides a frontend Google Map for clients to view tower coverage.
information.author: Charuwts, LLC

configuration.label: Logo URL
configuration.description: Displayed next to map on larger screens, above on smaller.

configuration.label: Link One
configuration.description: Display a button on the left. Syntax is Link|Title And you can use | in the Title after the first

configuration.label: Link Two
configuration.description: Display a button on the right. Syntax is Link|Title And you can use | in the Title after the first
